rooms.name: Entrance Hall / Vestibule
rooms.description: Spacious entryway designed to greet guests and family members, integrating a small foyer area that adheres to Vastu principles by ensuring clarity of direction.

rooms.name: Open Living & Dining Area
rooms.description: A combined living and dining space with ample natural light from large windows facing the East, balancing energy according to Vastu principles. Designed for family gatherings.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: One-bedroom guest suite featuring a private bathroom and adjoining balcony; positioned on the North side in accordance with Vastu guidelines to promote good energy flow.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom Suite
rooms.description: Primary bedroom with en-suite bathroom, walk-in closet, and an attached balcony. Placed on the North-East corner for optimal Vastu balance.

rooms.name: Study / Home Office
rooms.description: A functional study space with ample storage, positioned in a quiet corner of the ground floor to encourage productivity while respecting Vastu for knowledge and creativity.

rooms.name: Private Gymnasium
rooms.description: Dedicated gym area featuring modern equipment and soundproofing measures, located in a well-ventilated section of the villa. Although not specified by Vastu for physical health, its placement ensures minimal disturbance to living spaces.

rooms.name: Utility / Storage
rooms.description: Storage and utility room for household equipment, positioned to support the overall flow of the ground floor.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A home theater designed with acoustic treatments and ambient lighting. Its location is chosen near the entrance hall for easy access while maintaining privacy.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: Large, inviting door with secure locking mechanisms and aesthetic design. Placed on the North side following Vastu guidelines.

openings.name: Side Entrance
openings.description: Secondary entrance for service vehicles and deliveries, designed to minimize disturbance to the main living areas.
